page.title: 05EVERYDAY LIFE
page.content: REBECCA JOHNS At 07.00 I get up,wash,dress and have breakfast.At 08.45 the minibus comes to take us to school.First we take registration and then we do maths or english until 12.00 midday .Then we have dinner.After dinner we do things like science,art,craft,topics,PE, music etc. We have two playtimes and an hour and a quarter for dinner. At 15.45 we go home. When I get home I either stay inside and watch television or go outside and play. I eat another meal sometimes at the table and sometimes in front of the TV. I often read a book later. Sometimes I go to visit a friend. At 21.30 I go to bed.
